model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Calculation

    public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
implements Calculation
    Model class (one of 3 classes from MVC pattern), contains number conversion algorithm hex2dec and dec2hex Implements methods from interface Calculation
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Michał Pocheć
